alert.note: Alert for Andrew; Buchanan; Holt; Platte (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 12:36AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Doniphan, Leavenworth, northwestern Johnson, Atchison, western Buchanan, southeastern Holt, northwestern Platte and southwestern Andrew Counties through 115 AM CDT... At 1236 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Hiawatha to near Topeka. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... St. Joseph, Leavenworth, Lansing, Atchison, De Soto, Tonganoxie, Basehor, Weston, Wathena, Elwood, Highland, Troy, Effingham, Linwood, Amazonia, Rushville, Lancaster, Easton, Muscotah and Denton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 29 between mile markers 59 and 68. Kansas Turnpike between mile markers 206 and 222. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
